20110119163428.000|20110119163428.000|CC1|>> YEAH.                        
20110119163428.000|20110119163430.000|CC1|>> GOT A LITTLE MOCK-UP OVER    
20110119163430.000|20110119163430.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110119163430.000|20110119163431.000|CC1|WHAT ARE SOME OF THE THINGS THAT
20110119163431.000|20110119163434.000|CC1|PEOPLE REALLY NEED TO BE AWARE  
20110119163434.000|20110119163435.000|CC1|OF?                             
20110119163435.000|20110119163435.000|CC1|S                               
20110119163435.000|20110119163436.000|CC1|>> IT'S THE WEIGHT OF THE SNOW  
20110119163436.000|20110119163438.000|CC1|AND THE ICE.                    
20110119163438.000|20110119163439.000|CC1|ICE AT ONE INCH THICK WEIGHS    
20110119163439.000|20110119163441.000|CC1|FIVE POUNDS A SQUARE FOOT.      
20110119163441.000|20110119163443.000|CC1|TWELVE INCHES OF SNOW, FIVE     
20110119163443.000|20110119163444.000|CC1|POUNDS A SQUARE FOOT.           
20110119163444.000|20110119163445.000|CC1|IT PUTS A LOT OF STRESS ON YOUR 
20110119163445.000|20110119163446.000|CC1|ROOF.                           
20110119163446.000|20110119163448.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO PULL THAT SNOW OFF  
20110119163448.000|20110119163449.000|CC1|THE ROOF AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.   
20110119163449.000|20110119163450.000|CC1|>> ALMOST LIKE THE SAME THEORY  
20110119163450.000|20110119163451.000|CC1|WHEN YOU WALK OUT IN THE MORNING
20110119163451.000|20110119163453.000|CC1|AND SEE A FOOT OF SNOW ON TOP OF
20110119163453.000|20110119163454.000|CC1|YOUR CAR, YOU'VE GOT TO BRUSH IT
20110119163454.000|20110119163455.000|CC1|OFF THE ROOF.                   
20110119163455.000|20110119163456.000|CC1|YOU'VE GOT A TOOL THAT HELPS    
20110119163456.000|20110119163456.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110119163456.000|20110119163458.000|CC1|>> I DON'T WANT ANYBODY GETTING 
20110119163458.000|20110119163459.000|CC1|ON THEIR ROOF AND REMOVING SNOW.
20110119163459.000|20110119163502.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO USE A SNOW RAKE.    
20110119163502.000|20110119163504.000|CC1|YOU CAN PULL THAT OFF OF THE    
20110119163504.000|20110119163505.000|CC1|ROOF WITH THE SNOW RAKE.        
20110119163505.000|20110119163506.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO GO WITH THE SLOPE OF
20110119163506.000|20110119163507.000|CC1|THE ROOF.                       
20110119163507.000|20110119163509.000|CC1|YOU NOVER WANT TO PULL IT       
20110119163509.000|20110119163510.000|CC1|SIDEWAYS BECAUSE YOU COULD      
20110119163510.000|20110119163511.000|CC1|DAMAGE THE SHINGLE.             
20110119163511.000|20110119163512.000|CC1|>> GOT IT.                      
20110119163512.000|20110119163513.000|CC1|>> AND THAT'S THE ONE KEY MAKE  
20110119163513.000|20110119163515.000|CC1|SURE YOU'RE PULLING IT DOWN AND 
20110119163515.000|20110119163515.000|CC1|NOT ACROSS.                     
20110119163515.000|20110119163516.000|CC1|>> EXACTLY.                     
20110119163516.000|20110119163517.000|CC1|>> SOMETHING LIKE THIS, AND I   
20110119163517.000|20110119163519.000|CC1|GUESS YOU CAN GET EXTENDERS     
20110119163519.000|20110119163520.000|CC1|PLACED ON IT TO MAKE IT AS LONG 
20110119163520.000|20110119163521.000|CC1|AS YOU HAVE TO?                 
20110119163521.000|20110119163523.000|CC1|>> OH, YEAH, TELESCOPIC POLE SO 
20110119163523.000|20110119163525.000|CC1|YOU CAN REACH REALLY HIGH AND   
20110119163525.000|20110119163526.000|CC1|PULL AS MUCH SNOW OFF AS        
20110119163526.000|20110119163527.000|CC1|POSSIBLE.                       
20110119163527.000|20110119163528.000|CC1|>> LET'S TALK ABOUT THE ICE DAMS
20110119163528.000|20110119163529.000|CC1|YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT.           
20110119163529.000|20110119163530.000|CC1|>> ICE DAMS.                    
20110119163530.000|20110119163531.000|CC1|ICE DAMS ARE CREATED WHEN HEAT  
20110119163531.000|20110119163532.000|CC1|FROM YOUR HOME GETS INTO YOUR   
20110119163532.000|20110119163533.000|CC1|ATTIC.                          
20110119163533.000|20110119163534.000|CC1|ALL RIGHT?                      
20110119163534.000|20110119163537.000|CC1|AND IT HEATS THE UNDERSIDE OF   
20110119163537.000|20110119163537.000|CC1|THE ROOF.                       
20110119163537.000|20110119163539.000|CC1|NOW THAT WILL MELT THE SNOW.    
20110119163539.000|20110119163541.000|CC1|THE WATER WILL DRAIN DOWN YOUR  
20110119163541.000|20110119163543.000|CC1|ROOF AND WHEN IT HITS THE       
20110119163543.000|20110119163543.000|CC1|OVERHANG, THE OVERHANG IS NOT   
20110119163543.000|20110119163546.000|CC1|HEATED, OKAY?                   
20110119163546.000|20110119163548.000|CC1|THE ICE DAMS CAN FORM.          
20110119163548.000|20110119163550.000|CC1|>> SO IF YOU'VE GOT THAT TYPE OF
20110119163550.000|20110119163551.000|CC1|BUILDUP, CERTAINLY, HOW DO YOU  
20110119163551.000|20110119163552.000|CC1|GET RID OF IT?                  
20110119163552.000|20110119163555.000|CC1|>> TAKE A HAMMER, A CHISEL,     
20110119163555.000|20110119163555.000|CC1|OKAY?                           
20110119163555.000|20110119163557.000|CC1|AND CREATE A LITTLE TROUGH      
20110119163557.000|20110119163558.000|CC1|THROUGH THE ICE DOM.            
20110119163558.000|20110119163601.000|CC1|YOU DON'T HAVE TO CHIP AWAY AT  
20110119163601.000|20110119163602.000|CC1|THE WHOLE ICE DAM.              
20110119163602.000|20110119163603.000|CC1|AND YOU DON'T WANT TO DAMAGE THE
20110119163603.000|20110119163604.000|CC1|ROOF, AS WELL.                  
20110119163604.000|20110119163605.000|CC1|>> ALSO YOU'VE GOT SOME ROOF    
20110119163605.000|20110119163606.000|CC1|MELT RIGHT THERE.               
20110119163606.000|20110119163607.000|CC1|NOW WITH ALL THIS WE HAVE TO    
20110119163607.000|20110119163609.000|CC1|STRESS, YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL. 
20110119163609.000|20110119163610.000|CC1|YOU DO HAVE TO PUT YOURSELF IN A
20110119163610.000|20110119163612.000|CC1|POSITION TO BE ABLE TO DO ALL   
20110119163612.000|20110119163614.000|CC1|THIS, BUT SAFETY IS KEY.        
20110119163614.000|20110119163615.000|CC1|>> IT'S DEFINITELY DANGEROUS.   
20110119163615.000|20110119163616.000|CC1|YOU'RE GOING TO BE ON A LADDER. 
20110119163616.000|20110119163618.000|CC1|SO YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL.      
20110119163618.000|20110119163621.000|CC1|ROOFMELT IS ALSO A GREAT OPTION.
20110119163621.000|20110119163622.000|CC1|CALCIUM CHLORIDE TABLETS.       
20110119163622.000|20110119163624.000|CC1|YOU THROW THAT ON TOP OF THE ICE
20110119163624.000|20110119163625.000|CC1|DAM, IT WILL MELT IT, CREATE A  
20110119163625.000|20110119163627.000|CC1|TROUGH AND THE WATER WILL RUN   
20110119163627.000|20110119163627.000|CC1|THROUGH.                        
20110119163627.000|20110119163628.000|CC1|>> NOW LET'S TALK ABOUT         
20110119163628.000|20110119163629.000|CC1|PREVENTION AND PREVENTING THESE 
20110119163629.000|20110119163631.000|CC1|ICE DAMS FROM FORMING IN THE    
20110119163631.000|20110119163631.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110119163631.000|20110119163632.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20110119163632.000|20110119163633.000|CC1|THIS IS A GREAT WAY TO PREVENT  
20110119163633.000|20110119163635.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110119163635.000|20110119163635.000|CC1|DE-ICER CABLE.                  
20110119163635.000|20110119163637.000|CC1|RAND YOU CAN SEE IT'S VERY EASY 
20110119163637.000|20110119163637.000|CC1|TO INSTALL.                     
20110119163637.000|20110119163638.000|CC1|COMES IN A KIT.                 
20110119163638.000|20110119163641.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO INSTALL IT IN A     
20110119163641.000|20110119163643.000|CC1|ZIGZAG PATTERN AT THE BOTTOM    
20110119163643.000|20110119163644.000|CC1|PORTION OF YOUR ROOF.           
20110119163644.000|20110119163646.000|CC1|THIS WILL MELT THE ICE WHEN IT  
20110119163646.000|20110119163647.000|CC1|FORMS.                          
20110119163647.000|20110119163648.000|CC1|>> AND YOU JUST NEED IT ON THE  
20110119163648.000|20110119163650.000|CC1|FIRST COUPLE OF INCHES?         
20110119163650.000|20110119163650.000|CC1|>> FIRST THREE FEET OF THE ROOF.
20110119163650.000|20110119163652.000|CC1|>> ALL RIGHT.                   
20110119163652.000|20110119163654.000|CC1|LET'S MOVE ON A LITTLE BIT.     
20110119163654.000|20110119163655.000|CC1|LET'S TALK ABOUT THE GUTTERS.   
20110119163655.000|20110119163657.000|CC1|BECAUSE THAT'S ALWAYS A HUGE    
20110119163657.000|20110119163658.000|CC1|ISSUE FOR PEOPLE.               
20110119163658.000|20110119163659.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE TO BE PRO-ACTIVE    
20110119163659.000|20110119163700.000|CC1|WITH THE GUTTERS.               
20110119163700.000|20110119163702.000|CC1|BEFORE THE WINTER STARTS YOU    
20110119163702.000|20110119163703.000|CC1|HAVE TO GET UP AND TAKE A LOOK  
20110119163703.000|20110119163704.000|CC1|AT YOUR GUTTERS.                
20110119163704.000|20110119163706.000|CC1|MAKE SURE THERE'S NO DEBRIS IN  
20110119163706.000|20110119163708.000|CC1|HERE CLOGGING THE GUTTER OR THE 
20110119163708.000|20110119163709.000|CC1|DOWNSPOT.                       
20110119163709.000|20110119163710.000|CC1|THEN ALSO IF ICE IS IN THERE YOU
20110119163710.000|20110119163712.000|CC1|WANT TO TAKE A HAMMER AND CHISEL
20110119163712.000|20110119163714.000|CC1|AGAIN, CREATE A TROUGH OR USE A 
20110119163714.000|20110119163716.000|CC1|HOSE WITH HOT WATER.            
20110119163716.000|20110119163717.000|CC1|NOT COLD WATER.                 
20110119163717.000|20110119163718.000|CC1|YOU'LL JUST MAKE THE PROBLEM    
20110119163718.000|20110119163718.000|CC1|WORSE.                          
20110119163718.000|20110119163719.000|CC1|GET THE HOT WATER IN THE GUTTER 
20110119163719.000|20110119163721.000|CC1|AND THAT WILL MELT THE ICE AWAY.
20110119163721.000|20110119163723.000|CC1|>> HEATED GUTTERS, NOT A BAD WAY
20110119163723.000|20110119163724.000|CC1|TO GO EITHER?                   
20110119163724.000|20110119163728.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT.     
20110119163728.000|20110119163730.000|CC1|IT'S CALLED GUTTERGLOVE.        
20110119163730.000|20110119163731.000|CC1|THIS WILL ALSO STOP DEBRIS FROM 
20110119163731.000|20110119163733.000|CC1|GETTING IN THERE, AS WELL.      
20110119163733.000|20110119163734.000|CC1|YOU INSTALL THIS OVER THE TOP OF
20110119163734.000|20110119163736.000|CC1|YOUR GUTTER AND IT HAS A HEATED 
20110119163736.000|20110119163737.000|CC1|CABLE IN IT.                    
20110119163737.000|20110119163738.000|CC1|THIS WILL MELT ANY ICE OR SNOW  
20110119163738.000|20110119163740.000|CC1|THAT ACCUMULATES ON YOUR ROOF.  
20110119163740.000|20110119163742.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL WITH  
20110119163742.000|20110119163743.000|CC1|WATER DAMAGE, TOO, BECAUSE WE'RE
20110119163743.000|20110119163744.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT A LOT OF MELTING  
20110119163744.000|20110119163745.000|CC1|GOING ON HERE.                  
20110119163745.000|20110119163746.000|CC1|NOT ONLY DO YOU HAVE PROBLEMS   
20110119163746.000|20110119163747.000|CC1|WITH THE SNOW AND THE ICE, WHEN 
20110119163747.000|20110119163749.000|CC1|IT ALL MELTS THAT CAN LEAD TO   
20110119163749.000|20110119163750.000|CC1|OTHER ISSUES.                   
20110119163750.000|20110119163752.000|CC1|>> YOU CAN GET MOISTURE IN YOUR 
20110119163752.000|20110119163752.000|CC1|ATTIC.                          
20110119163752.000|20110119163753.000|CC1|AND MOISTURE CAUSES MOLD AND    
20110119163753.000|20110119163755.000|CC1|MILDEW WHICH CAN BE A PROBLEM   
20110119163755.000|20110119163756.000|CC1|FOR THE RESPIRATORY SYSTEM.     
20110119163756.000|20110119163758.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO CHECK AND SEE IF    
20110119163758.000|20110119163800.000|CC1|THERE'S ANY DAMP INSULATION.    
20110119163800.000|20110119163803.000|CC1|ANY WATER CONDENSATING ON NAILS,
20110119163803.000|20110119163805.000|CC1|THAT'S WHERE YOU'LL SEE IT      
20110119163805.000|20110119163805.000|CC1|FIRST.                          
20110119163805.000|20110119163806.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE LOOKING AT PICTURES OF
20110119163806.000|20110119163807.000|CC1|MOLD.                           
20110119163807.000|20110119163809.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO BE PRO-ACTIVE.      
20110119163809.000|20110119163810.000|CC1|BUT ALSO AFTER THE FACT YOU HAVE
20110119163810.000|20110119163812.000|CC1|TO CHECK FOR THINGS LIKE THAT.  
20110119163812.000|20110119163813.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY IN OLDER HOMES.      
20110119163813.000|20110119163814.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20110119163814.000|20110119163816.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO USE AN R-38         
20110119163816.000|20110119163817.000|CC1|INSULATION.                     
20110119163817.000|20110119163818.000|CC1|AND IN COLDERTE CLIMATES YOU WA 
20110119163818.000|20110119163820.000|CC1|TO USE AN R-49.                 
20110119163820.000|20110119163823.000|CC1|THIS IS A BLOWN-IN TYPE         
20110119163823.000|20110119163824.000|CC1|INSULATION.                     
20110119163824.000|20110119163825.000|CC1|>> IS THAT WHAT YOU RECOMMEND   
20110119163825.000|20110119163826.000|CC1|THE BLOWN-IN RATHER THAN THE    
20110119163826.000|20110119163827.000|CC1|ROLL DOWN?                      
20110119163827.000|20110119163829.000|CC1|>> DEPENDING ON WHERE YOU LIVE. 
20110119163829.000|20110119163830.000|CC1|IF YOU LIVE IN MINNESOTA YOU    
20110119163830.000|20110119163832.000|CC1|WANT TO USE THE R-49 BLOW-IN.   
20110119163832.000|20110119163833.000|CC1|IF YOU LIVE IN NEW YORK YOU ASK 
20110119163833.000|20110119163835.000|CC1|GET AWAY WITH THE R-38.         
20110119163835.000|20110119163836.000|CC1|>> WITH ALL OF THESE THINGS THAT
20110119163836.000|20110119163838.000|CC1|WE'VE JUST SHOWN YOU HERE, ALL  
20110119163838.000|20110119163839.000|CC1|AFFORDABLE?                     
20110119163839.000|20110119163840.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE ALL AFFORDABLE.      
20110119163840.000|20110119163842.000|CC1|I MEAN THIS COST $15 A LINEAL

20110119163847.000|20110119163847.000|CC1|LINEAL FOOT.                    
20110119163847.000|20110119163848.000|CC1|>> JOHN, THANK YOU VERY MUCH.   
20110119163848.000|20110119163849.000|CC1|>> OH.                          
20110119163849.000|20110119163850.000|CC1|MY PLEASURE.                    
20110119163850.000|20110119163851.000|CC1|>> WE DO APPRECIATE IT.

20110119163852.000|20110119163853.000|CC1|FROM WATER DAMAGE GO TO OUR     
20110119163853.000|20110119163857.000|CC1|WEBSITE, EARLYSHOW.CBSNEWS.COM.

20110119163858.000|20110119163859.000|CC1|GREAT INFORMATION FOR YOU TO    
20110119163859.000|20110119163900.000|CC1|APPLY.                          
20110119163900.000|20110119163900.000|CC1|ALL RIGHT.                      
20110119163900.000|20110119163901.000|CC1|ERICA, LET'S GO OVER TO YOU.    
20110119163901.000|20110119163902.000|CC1|>> CHRIS, THANKS.               
20110119163902.000|20110119163904.000|CC1|IN ADDITION TO THE HAVOC THAT   
20110119163904.000|20110119163905.000|CC1|WINTER CAN WREAK ON YOUR HOME IT
20110119163905.000|20110119163906.000|CC1|CAN SUCK THE LIFE OUT OF YOUR   
20110119163906.000|20110119163907.000|CC1|SKIN AND YOUR HAIR.             
20110119163907.000|20110119163908.000|CC1|BUT NOT ANY LONGER.             
20110119163908.000|20110119163910.000|CC1|MOLLY NOVER-BAKER IS DIRECTOR OF
20110119163910.000|20110119163911.000|CC1|"WOMEN'S HEALTH" MAGAZINE AND   
20110119163911.000|20110119163913.000|CC1|SHE'S HERE TO HELP US THIS      
20110119163913.000|20110119163913.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110119163913.000|20110119163915.000|CC1|I FEEL LIKE EVERYONE YOU TALK TO
20110119163915.000|20110119163916.000|CC1|WILL SAY TO YOU MY I SKIN IN TH 
20110119163916.000|20110119163917.000|CC1|WINTER IS AWFUL.                
20110119163917.000|20110119163919.000|CC1|>> SKIN OR HAIR, CAN REALLY     
20110119163919.000|20110119163921.000|CC1|WREAK HAVOC ON US FROM HEAD TO  
20110119163921.000|20110119163921.000|CC1|TOE.                            
20110119163921.000|20110119163922.000|CC1|>> IS IT JUST BECAUSE IT'S SO   
20110119163922.000|20110119163923.000|CC1|COLD OUT OR IS THERE SOMETHING  
20110119163923.000|20110119163926.000|CC1|MORE THAT REALLY DEPLETES       
20110119163926.000|20110119163926.000|CC1|EVERYTHING?                     
20110119163926.000|20110119163927.000|CC1|>> THERE'S A COMBINATION OF     
20110119163927.000|20110119163928.000|CC1|THINGS HAPPENING.               
20110119163928.000|20110119163929.000|CC1|YOU'VE GOT WEATHER THAT'S DRY   
20110119163929.000|20110119163930.000|CC1|AND COLD OUTSIDE.               
20110119163930.000|20110119163931.000|CC1|YOU'RE GOING TO HEATED INDOORS, 
20110119163931.000|20110119163933.000|CC1|THE YO-YO EFFORT OF THE         
20110119163933.000|20110119163934.000|CC1|TEMPERATURE CAUSING A LOT OF    
20110119163934.000|20110119163934.000|CC1|ISSUE.                          
20110119163934.000|20110119163936.000|CC1|STATIC ELECTRICITY IN THE HAIR. 
20110119163936.000|20110119163937.000|CC1|>> GREAT.                       
20110119163937.000|20110119163938.000|CC1|AND WE KNOW ONE OF THE MAJOR    
20110119163938.000|20110119163940.000|CC1|THINGS WE CAN DO IS DRINK A LOT 
20110119163940.000|20110119163941.000|CC1|OF WATER AND HYDRATE.           
20110119163941.000|20110119163941.000|CC1|>> YEAH.                        
20110119163941.000|20110119163943.000|CC1|>> THAT'S THE FIRST GOOD STEP   
20110119163943.000|20110119163943.000|CC1|FOR YOUR DULL SKIN.             
20110119163943.000|20110119163945.000|CC1|BUT YOU HAVE SOME PRODUCTS THAT 
20110119163945.000|20110119163946.000|CC1|CAN REALLY HELP US AS WELL.     
20110119163946.000|20110119163948.000|CC1|>> WITH DULL SKIN, OUR SKIN     
20110119163948.000|20110119163949.000|CC1|CELLS ARE NOT TURNING OVER AS   
20110119163949.000|20110119163950.000|CC1|FAST AS THEY USED TO.           
20110119163950.000|20110119163952.000|CC1|SO YOU'VE GOT A BUILDUP OF DEAD 
20110119163952.000|20110119163953.000|CC1|SKIN ON YOUR SURFACE.           
20110119163953.000|20110119163954.000|CC1|>> WHICH SOUNDS LOVELY.         
20110119163954.000|20110119163955.000|CC1|>> HORRIBLE, RIGHT?             
20110119163955.000|20110119163956.000|CC1|OUR CIRCULATION IS SLUGGISH, SO 
20110119163956.000|20110119163958.000|CC1|THOSE FINE LINES AND WRINKLES   
20110119163958.000|20110119163959.000|CC1|THAT WEREN'T SO NOTICEABLE      
20110119163959.000|20110119164001.000|CC1|BEFORE ALL OF A SUDDEN REALLY   
20110119164001.000|20110119164001.000|CC1|PRONOUNCED.                     
20110119164001.000|20110119164004.000|CC1|DRINK A LOT OF WATER, WORK EE   
20110119164004.000|20110119164007.000|CC1|MEGA THREE FATTY ACIDS INTO YOUR
